thread.title: China official services PMI edges up to 53.9 in July
thread.title_full: China official services PMI edges up to 53.9 in July | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: China official services PMI edges up to 53.9 in July
text:
SHANGHAI Aug 1 Activity in China's services industry quickened slightly in July from the previous month, an official survey showed on Saturday.
The official non-manufacturing Purchasing Managers' Index (PMI) stood at 53.9 in July, compared with the previous month's reading of 53.8 and above the 50-point mark that separates growth from contraction on a monthly basis. (Editing by Kim Coghill)
